name: Loan Calculator

description: Dark-themed web application with sleek midnight aesthetics and modern user interface design elements.

description: Personal expense tracker to monitor daily spending, categorize transactions, and manage your budget effectively

name: Smile Selfie
description: Capture your smile & gestures with Smart Selfie

name: Whatsapp Lite
description: Direct peer-to-peer messaging platform enabling instant, server-free communication between users.

name: Note Cloud
description: Cloud-powered personal notebook app with Firebase backend, featuring rich text formatting.

name: Photo Editor
description: Advanced Photo Editor is a powerful, browser-based image editing application built with modern web technologies.

name: Light Bill Manager
description: Track Your Electricity Bills with node Web Power App. Summarize analyze.

name: Maintenance Tracker
description: Track and manage all your home maintenance tasks, bills, and repair schedules in one organized digital platform.

description: A peer-to-peer video calling application built with WebRTC and Firebase.

name: Quick File Sharing
description: A modern web-based file sharing platform built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS.

name: Image Viewer
description: Minimalist online photo viewer with drag-and-drop functionality, supporting JPG, PNG, WEBP, and SVG formats.

name: Movie Explorer
description: Cinematic discovery platform to search movies, view details, and track recent search history.

name: Dear Weather
description: Sleek weather dashboard built with React & Vite. Features real-time data, hourly forecasts, and a stunning dark UI.

name: Drive Cinema
description: Personal streaming service using Google Drive API. Built with Next.js 15, custom stream proxy (Range API), NextAuth, and Glassmorphism UI.

name: Scanner Vision
description: Universal barcode scanner & generator tool. Supports QR codes, EAN, UPC, and standard barcodes with instant detection.

name: Glass PDF Editor
description: Secure, serverless PDF manipulation tool built with Next.js 16. Merge, split, sign, and edit PDFs entirely in-browser with a premium Glassmorphism UI.
